# lodash.memoize v3.0.4

The [modern build](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/wiki/Build-Differences) of [lodashâ€™s](https://lodash.com/) `_.memoize` exported as a [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/)/[io.js](https://iojs.org/) module.

## Installation

Using npm:

```bash
$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.memoize
```

In Node.js/io.js:

```js
var memoize = require('lodash.memoize');
```

See the [documentation](https://lodash.com/docs#memoize) or [package source](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/blob/3.0.4-npm-packages/lodash.memoize) for more details.
